description: 智慧金句库 - 用于各个环节的权威引言和深度思考

认知觉醒.description: 关于认知盲区和思维误区的经典洞察

quotes.text: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself — and you are the easiest person to fool.
quotes.chinese_translation: 第一原理是你不能欺骗自己——而你是最容易被欺骗的人。
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: It ain't what you don't know that gets you into trouble. It's what you know for sure that just ain't so.
quotes.chinese_translation: 让你陷入麻烦的不是你不知道的事，而是你确信无疑但实际错误的事。
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
quotes.chinese_translation: 知识最大的敌人不是无知，而是知识的错觉。
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

团队合作.description: 关于团队协作、领导力和组织管理的智慧

quotes.text: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
quotes.chinese_translation: 如果你想走得快，一个人走。如果你想走得远，一起走。
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.text: Great teams are not made up of many well-rounded players. Great teams are made up of players who specialize in what they do best.
quotes.chinese_translation: 伟大的团队不是由许多全能选手组成的，而是由专精于自己最擅长领域的选手组成的。
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.chinese_translation: 团队的力量在于每个成员，每个成员的力量在于团队。
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

创新与技术.description: 关于技术创新、产品开发和技术思维的洞察

quotes.text: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
quotes.chinese_translation: 技术不算什么。重要的是你要相信人们本质上是善良和聪明的，如果你给他们工具，他们会用这些工具做出精彩的事情。
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.chinese_translation: 创新区分了领导者和跟随者。
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.chinese_translation: 预测未来的最好方法就是创造未来。
quotes.author: Alan Kay

商业智慧.description: 关于商业策略、市场洞察和企业经营的经典智慧

quotes.text: Your customer doesn't care how much you know until they know how much you care.
quotes.chinese_translation: 客户不在乎你知道多少，直到他们知道你有多在乎他们。
quotes.author: Damon Richards

quotes.text: Build something 100 people love, not something 1 million people kind of like.
quotes.chinese_translation: 构建100个人热爱的东西，而不是100万人有点喜欢的东西。
quotes.author: Brian Chesky

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that's changing quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.chinese_translation: 最大的风险就是不承担任何风险...在一个快速变化的世界里，唯一注定失败的策略就是不承担风险。
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

学习与成长.description: 关于学习方法、个人成长和持续改进的智慧

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.chinese_translation: 像明天就要死去那样生活，像永远都会活着那样学习。
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.chinese_translation: 读得越多，知道的就越多。学得越多，去的地方就越多。
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

决策与判断.description: 关于决策方法、判断力和理性思维的洞察

quotes.text: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.chinese_translation: 在任何决策时刻，你能做的最好的事就是正确的事，次好的是错误的事，而最糟糕的是什么都不做。
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
quotes.chinese_translation: 能够生存下来的物种，不是最强壮的，也不是最聪明的，而是最能适应变化的。
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

opening_quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
opening_quotes.chinese_translation: 未经审视的人生不值得过。
opening_quotes.author: Socrates

opening_quotes.text: Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing.
opening_quotes.chinese_translation: 质疑一切，学习一些，不回答任何事。
opening_quotes.author: Euripides

closing_quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
closing_quotes.chinese_translation: 唯一真正的智慧是知道你什么都不知道。
closing_quotes.author: Socrates
closing_quotes.usage: 认知觉醒后的谦逊提醒

closing_quotes.text: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
closing_quotes.chinese_translation: 我们无法用创造问题时的思维来解决问题。
closing_quotes.author: Albert Einstein
closing_quotes.usage: 认知重构完成时的总结

transition_quotes.text: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
transition_quotes.chinese_translation: 改变的第一步是意识，第二步是接受。
transition_quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden
